summary: Implement real internal access-code verification (A/B) to route to login/register, and add Superadmin settings to view/edit active codes and statuses.
architectural_notes: Replace InternalGatePage mockResponse routing with a backend/canister verifyInternalAccessCode call that returns the correct route (/internal/login for A, /internal/daftar for B).
Define storage/source-of-truth for access codes and their statuses, readable/updatable from Superadmin settings.
known_issues: InternalGatePage currently uses a hardcoded mockResponse that always routes any code to /internal/login; must be replaced with real verification logic.

existing_features.title: Replace the mockResponse behavior in frontend InternalGatePage with real backend verification: submit the entered code to the backend and navigate to the backend-provided route only when verification succeeds; otherwise show an invalid-code error.

Implement the Superadmin Dashboard "Pengaturan" tab content to load and display a list of all internal access codes (A and B) with their status, and provide controls for Superadmin to update the code values and statuses.

Add/extend frontend React Query hooks to call the new backend APIs for verifying internal access codes and for Superadmin to fetch/update the internal access codes; ensure queries are invalidated/refetched after updates so the settings list stays current.

new_feature_requests.summary: Activate real backend logic for internal access-code verification so Code A routes to /internal/login (Asistenku masuk) and Code B routes to /internal/daftar (Asistenku daftar), replacing the current mockResponse behavior.
Add Superadmin > Pengaturan tab UI to load/view a list of all active internal access codes with their status, and allow Superadmin to update/change the codes (A/B).

Implement backend support for real internal access-code verification so that entering Code A routes to "/internal/login" (Asistenku masuk) and entering Code B routes to "/internal/daftar" (Asistenku daftar). The backend must reject any other code as invalid.
Add backend APIs for Superadmin to load/view the current internal access codes and their status, and to update/rotate/change Code A and Code B along with their status.

projectName: Activate real internal access-code verification and Superadmin settings to view/update Code A & B
